org.elasticsearch.repositories.blobstore

类 ChecksumBlobStoreFormat<T extends ToXContent>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.repositories.blobstore.BlobStoreFormat<T>
      • org.elasticsearch.repositories.blobstore.ChecksumBlobStoreFormat<T>

  • public class ChecksumBlobStoreFormat<T extends ToXContent>
extends BlobStoreFormat<T>
    Snapshot metadata file format used in v2.0 and above

      • ChecksumBlobStoreFormat

        public ChecksumBlobStoreFormat(java.lang.String codec,
                               java.lang.String blobNameFormat,
                               CheckedFunction<XContentParser,T,java.io.IOException> reader,
                               NamedXContentRegistry namedXContentRegistry,
                               boolean compress,
                               XContentType xContentType)
        参数:
        codec - codec name
        blobNameFormat - format of the blobname in String.format(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object...) format
        reader - prototype object that can deserialize T from XContent
        compress - true if the content should be compressed
        xContentType - content type that should be used for write operations

      • ChecksumBlobStoreFormat

    • 方法详细资料

      • readBlob

        public T readBlob(BlobContainer blobContainer,
                  java.lang.String blobName)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Reads blob with specified name without resolving the blobName using using BlobStoreFormat.blobName(java.lang.String) method.
        指定者:
        readBlob 在类中 BlobStoreFormat<T extends ToXContent>
        参数:
        blobContainer - blob container
        blobName - blob name
        返回:
        parsed blob object
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeAtomic

        public void writeAtomic(T obj,
                        BlobContainer blobContainer,
                        java.lang.String name)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Writes blob in atomic manner with resolving the blob name using BlobStoreFormat.blobName(java.lang.String) and tempBlobName(java.lang.String) methods.

        The blob will be compressed and checksum will be written if required. Atomic move might be very inefficient on some repositories. It also cannot override existing files.

        参数:
        obj - object to be serialized
        blobContainer - blob container
        name - blob name
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • write

        public void write(T obj,
                  BlobContainer blobContainer,
                  java.lang.String name)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Writes blob with resolving the blob name using BlobStoreFormat.blobName(java.lang.String) method.

        The blob will be compressed and checksum will be written if required.

        参数:
        obj - object to be serialized
        blobContainer - blob container
        name - blob name
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeBlob

        protected void writeBlob(T obj,
                         BlobContainer blobContainer,
                         java.lang.String blobName)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Writes blob in atomic manner without resolving the blobName using using BlobStoreFormat.blobName(java.lang.String) method.

        The blob will be compressed and checksum will be written if required.

        参数:
        obj - object to be serialized
        blobContainer - blob container
        blobName - blob name
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • isTempBlobName

        public boolean isTempBlobName(java.lang.String blobName)
        Returns true if the blob is a leftover temporary blob. The temporary blobs might be left after failed atomic write operation.

                        throws java.io.IOException
